home.picasso:
I am always doing things I can’t do.
That is how I get to learn how to do them.

about.title: About
about.txt:
By gaining proficiency in Adobe tools and development languages,
I am establishing myself as a versatile professional capable of handling both design and development tasks in practical settings.

sextxt.respons:
Overall web UI/UX design and development for Samsung Electronics’ HR system
Development of component-based UI considering web accessibility and standards
Implementation of web interfaces that effectively visualize large-scale data
sextxt.keyach:
Designed a structure with improved component reusability and maintainability based on Vue.js
Collaborated closely with designers and planners to deliver intuitive user experiences (UX)
Introduced performance optimization strategies such as lazy loading and code splitting
sextxt.techstack: Vue.js, HTML5, SCSS, JavaScript (ES6+), Git, Adobe

wextxt.position: UI/UX Designer & Frontend Developer / Web & App Designer and Publisher
wextxt.respons:
Designed mobile app UI/UX and created screen layouts
Implemented frontend features and animations using Flutter
Led UI/UX improvements based on user feedback
Planned and created web/app designs considering UI/UX principles
Built responsive websites and maintained existing platforms
Applied designs to improve accessibility and user convenience
wextxt.keyach:
Independently handled design and development; launched the app in a short period
Managed schedules and collaboration in a remote environment using Adobe XD and Git
Implemented interactive and responsive UI with focus on user experience
Solely responsible for all corporate web/app design and publishing tasks
Achieved high-quality results reflected in live homepage and subpages
Improved mobile usability through HTML/CSS-based responsive publishing
wextxt.techstack: Flutter, Dart, Adobe XD, Git, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Photoshop, Illustrator
